meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by the education of both sexes together.
meanings.sent1: The coeducationally classroom had boys and girls learning side by side.
meanings.sent2: The school embraced a coeducationally approach, promoting equality in education.
meanings.sent3: The coeducationally picnic brought boys and girls together for a fun day of learning.
meanings.sent4: Her coeducationally mindset blended the strengths of both genders seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The coeducationally environment fostered collaboration and understanding among students.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves the education of both males and females together.
meanings.sent1: The school decided to teach coeducationally to promote gender equality.
meanings.sent2: The students worked coeducationally on the group project, sharing ideas effectively.
meanings.sent3: The teacher smiled coeducationally as she saw the boys and girls working together.
meanings.sent4: The team coeducationally tackled the challenging assignment with great success.
meanings.sent5: The choir sang coeducationally, blending voices harmoniously.
